home.title: Home
home.p: Welcome to Uxtrendz. Uxtrendz provides you very useful and helpfull video tutorials and all in Hindi language. Please see our Playlist: Angular 6/7/8 Series in Hindi, Angular Exercise, Sass(Scss) Series in Hindi, How to (Hindi) and many more. If you enjoyed our video tutorial so please Do Like, Comment, Share and most important.. Please Subscribe Uxtrendz youtube channel. Url: Youtube.com/Uxtrendz
